level.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term “written communications” means letters, memoranda, or other documents.
All requests for documents shall be handled in accordance with procedures set forth in the District of Columbia Freedom of Information Act.
Where a majority of the Board votes to issue a communication, the Chairperson or the Chairperson’s designee may sign the document and issue it on behalf of the Board.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 28 D.C. Reg. 1726 (April 17, 1981), incorporating by reference the text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 28 D.C. Reg.684, 688 (February 13, 1981).

level.heading: EDITOR’S NOTE
level.text: The District of Columbia Freedom of Information Act, which is referenced in subsection 105.2 of this section is codified at D.C. Code §§ 2-531 et seq. (2006 Repl.).
